table.name: civicrm_activity
table.comment: Other Activity details stored here include contact, location, details.

field.name: id
field.title: Activity ID
field.comment: Unique Other Activity ID

field.name: source_contact_id
field.comment: Contact ID of the person scheduling or logging this Activity. Usually the authenticated user.

field.name: source_record_id
field.comment: Artificial FK to original transaction (e.g. contribution) IF it is not an Activity. Table can be figured out through activity_type_id, and further through component registry.

field.name: activity_type_id
field.title: Activity Type ID
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.id, that has to be valid, registered activity type.

field.name: target_entity_table
field.comment: Name of table where item being referenced is stored.

field.name: target_entity_id
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: subject
field.comment: The subject/purpose/short description of the activity.

field.name: scheduled_date
field.comment: Date and time meeting is scheduled to occur.

field.name: activity_date_time
field.comment: Date and time this activity is scheduled to occur. Formerly named scheduled_date_time.

field.name: due_date_time
field.comment: Date and time this activity is due.

field.name: duration_hours
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of meeting - hours.

field.name: duration_minutes
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of meeting - minutes.

field.name: duration
field.title: Duration
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of activity expressed in minutes. Conglomerate of former duration_hours and duration_minutes.

field.name: location
field.title: Location
field.comment: Location of the activity (optional, open text).

field.name: phone_id
field.comment: Phone ID of the number called (optional - used if an existing phone number is selected).

field.name: phone_number
field.comment: Phone number in case the number does not exist in the civicrm_phone table.

field.name: details
field.title: Details
field.comment: Details about the activity (agenda, notes, etc).

field.name: status
field.comment: What is the status of this meeting? Completed meeting status results in activity history entry.

field.name: status_id
field.title: Activity Status Label
field.comment: ID of the status this activity is currently in. Foreign key to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: priority_id
field.comment: ID of the priority given to this activity. Foreign key to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: parent_id
field.comment: Parent meeting ID (if this is a follow-up item). This is not currently implemented

field.name: activity_tag1_id
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: activity_tag2_id
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: activity_tag3_id
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.
